meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Julie Bratvold Ghanbari Elisa Leigan Dan Burke Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6423.

td.p: Julie Bratvold Ghanbari, a stay-at-home mom from San Diego, California
Elisa Leigan, a mental health therapist from San Luis Obispo, California
Dan Burke, a high school theology teacher from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,798)

tr.td: MYSTERIES & THRILLERS
CHINESE ZODIAC ANIMALS
BEGINS & ENDS IN "K"
NO BED BUT BATH & BEYOND
POTPOURRI
ADDRESSING THE BALLPARK
(Alex: We'll give you the address, you tell us the team that plays there as their home field.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'A man travels back in time to try to prevent JFK\'s assassination in Stephen King\'s thriller named for this date')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: A man travels back in time to try to prevent JFK's assassination in Stephen King's thriller named for this date

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '"Bear" down now--this Alaskan island was headquarters of the Russian-American Company until 1804')

...

5

Elisa
Triple Stumper
')
